column1: Little Goat Diner////We were seated immediately and despite my request
column2: rooftop was closed :(. Feeling extra fatty
column3: I tried the tiramisu shake and he had coffee. Shake was $7 and I felt I was drinking a $2.99 chocolate shake from Denny's. It had little pieces of chocolate cereal or dried up bread
column4: couldn't tell the difference. His coffee was so strong
column5: he used half the damn raw sugar to sweeten it up. Service was quick and efficient despite it being crazy packed for 11:30a on a Monday. Maybe all the hungover Lolla-goers pulled the same move as us?
